tools

Class CheckSum

  • java.lang.Object
    • tools.CheckSum

  • public class CheckSum
extends java.lang.Object
    CheckSum class is responsible for giving checksum results according to the selected encryption algorithm.
    Author:
    vliopard

      • setMethod

        public static void setMethod(int cypherTypeMethod)
        This method uses Settings.CypherMethodList[] to set the encryption method for calculating checksum results.
        Parameters:
        cypherTypeMethod - An int value index for the desired algorithm.

      • createChecksum

        public static byte[] createChecksum(java.lang.String fileName)
        This method creates a checksum byte array from a given file name.
        Parameters:
        fileName - A String containing a path to the file to be calculated.
        Returns:
        Returns a byte array that contains the encrypted representation of a file.

      • getChecksumSimple

        public static java.lang.String getChecksumSimple(java.lang.String fileName)
        This method creates a String checksum value from a given filename through a simple method calculation.
        Parameters:
        fileName - A String containing a path to the file to be calculated.
        Returns:
        Returns a String containing the encrypted representation of a file.

      • getChecksumFaster

        public static java.lang.String getChecksumFaster(java.lang.String fileName)
                                          throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        This method creates a String checksum value from a given filename through a faster method calculation.
        Parameters:
        fileName - A String containing a path to the file to be calculated.
        Returns:
        Returns a String containing the encrypted representation of a file.
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - This exception will be raised in case the return value could not be converted to the ASCII.
